summary: Most bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block remained within 3% of yesterday's price on Tuesday. Bitcoin was trading at around $16,400 by market close.
title: Bitcoin mining stock report: Tuesday, November 29
content: TeraWulf fell by 7.9% and BIT Mining rose by 7.69%, but the share price for most other bitcoin miners traded little changed on Tuesday.
Bitcoin was trading at around $16,400 by market close, according to data from TradingView.
BTCUSD Chart by TradingView
Mawson Infrastructure was another outlier to the downside, falling by 5.58%, but the share price for most other bitcoin miners traded within 3% of yesterday's price.
Here's how crypto mining companies performed on Tuesday, Nov. 29:
